replies.message: Hi Emily, thanks for getting in touch. This promotion ends tonight at midnight, so the winner hasn't been notified yet. For relevant info please visit: http://spr.ly/61828olUp. Hope this helps :)
Ah thank you. My mum was trying to tell me it was yesterday lol
Hey Adam, we're aware of this error and are working to fix it. Thanks for sharing
I am still not able to log it to send my codes that I collect....is the contest is really happening or it's just for advertising?!?

Hi Florin, we're sorry to hear this. Could you give us a call on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1), Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm, so we can help you troubleshoot. The main promotion has now ended but you can use your codes for the bonus draw that will take place on 30/09/17. Thanks
